original_text: While Gabriel spoke to me I was lying with my face on the ground. I was asleep. But he touched me and he caused me to stand up.
korean_text: 그가 내게 말할 때에 내가 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드리어 깊이 잠들매 그가 나를 어루만져서 일으켜 세우며

sentences.original_text: I was lying with my face on the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 얼굴을 땅에 대고 누워 있었다

sentences.original_text: and he caused me to stand up
